nodes.text: This male individual was a gunner of the Rebel Alliance. He served under Captain Miara Larte, and was offworld when his homeworld of Alderaan was destroyed. He was present in the Great Temple on Yavin 4 in 0 ABY for the Royal Award Ceremony.
In "By Whatever Sun", Miara notes that the gunner is named 'Hester or Heattens or something like that'.
